attributes.action: support an Independent International Investigation into the events of September 11 2001
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The official US Commission investigation into 9/11 has been widely discredited. The Commission's Executive Director Philip D. Zelikow was a Bush White House insider who had the power to direct investigations away from certain topics. Much of the evidence presented was heard in secret by Mr Zelikow and not passed on to the other Commissioners. The 9/11 Victim's Families have called for a new independent and international investigation.
